sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
    View, 
    Text, 
    StyleSheet,
    Image,
    TouchableOpacity,
    TextInput,
    FlatList,
    ScrollView,
} from "react-native";
import {icons,COLORS, FONTS, SIZES,images} from "../constant";

const NewFeeds = [
  {
      id:0,
      text:"New Feed 1",
      img:images.newFeed1,
      avt:images.avatar1,
      name:"human 1",
      time:"1 day ago",
      heart:5,
      cmt:2
  },
  {
      id:1,
      text:"New Feed 2",
      img:images.newFeed2,
      avt:images.avatar2,
      name:"human 2",
      time:"1 day ago",
      heart:10,
      cmt:6
  },
  {
      id:2,
      text:"New Feed 3",
      img:images.newFeed3,
      avt:images.avatar3,
      name:"human 3",
      time:"1 day ago",
      heart:8,
      cmt:1
  },
  {
      id:3,
      text:"New Feed 4",
      img:images.newFeed4,
      avt:images.avatar4,
      name:"human 4",
      time:"1 day ago",
      heart:6,
      cmt:4
  },
  {
      id:4,
      text:"New Feed 5",
      img:images.newFeed5,
      avt:images.avatar5,
      name:"human 5",
      time:"1 day ago",
      heart:5,
      cmt:2
  },
  {
      id:5,
      text:"New Feed 6",
      img:images.newFeed6,
      avt:images.avatar6,
      name:"human 6",
      time:"1 day ago",
      heart:10,
      cmt:5
  },
  {
      id:6,
      text:"New Feed 7",
      img:images.newFeed7,
      avt:images.avatar7,
      name:"human 7",
      time:"1 day ago",
      heart:5,
      cmt:2
  },
  {
    id:7,
    text:"New Feed 8",
    img:images.newFeed8,
    avt:images.avatar8,
    name:"human 8",
    time:"1 day ago",
    heart:5,
    cmt:2
  }
];


const Feeds = () => {
  function renderSearchBar () {
    return(
      <View style = {style.label}>
               <View style ={{flexDirection:'row',height:60,paddingHorizontal:SIZES.padding,alignItems:'center'}}>
                  <Image source={icons.tag} resizeMode='cover' style={{height:25,width:25,tintColor:COLORS.gray}}/>
                  <TextInput style ={{flex:1,marginLeft:SIZES.font,fontSize:15,fontWeight:'bold'}} value={Text} placeholder="Search tags" placeholderTextColor={COLORS.gray}/>
               </View>
              </View>
    )
  }  
  function renderNewFeeds () {
    const renderItem = ({item}) => (
      <TouchableOpacity style ={{marginVertical:15,marginHorizontal:20, height:500,width:380,backgroundColor:COLORS.white,borderRadius:30,shadowOpacity:0.35,shadowRadius:10}}>
        <View style ={{flexDirection:'column'}}>
          <Image source={item.img} resizeMode='cover' style={{width:'100%',height:380,borderTopLeftRadius:30,borderTopRightRadius:30}} />
          <View style ={{flexDirection:'row',height:'10%'}}>
            <Image source={item.avt} resizeMode='cover' style={{height:30, width:30, borderRadius:15,marginTop:10,marginLeft:20}}  />
            <Text style ={{marginLeft:10,marginTop:15,...FONTS.body3,fontWeight:'bold'}}>{item.name}</Text>
            <Text style ={{marginLeft:160,marginTop:10,...FONTS.body4,color:COLORS.gray}}>{item.time}</Text>
          </View>
          <View style ={{height:'6%'}}>
            <Text style ={{marginLeft:30,fontSize:16}}>{item.text}</Text>
          </View>
          <View style ={{height:'6%',width:'40%',backgroundColor:COLORS.white,borderRadius:20,flexDirection:'row-reverse',marginRight:25,shadowOpacity:0.15,shadowRadius:10}}>
              <Image source={icons.comment} resizeMode ='cover' style={{height:15,width:15,marginRight:26,marginTop:7}} />
              <Text style ={{marginHorizontal:5,marginLeft:16,marginTop:5}}>{item.cmt}</Text>
            <View style ={{width:'55%',flexDirection:'row',borderRadius:20,alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center'}}>
              <Text style ={{marginHorizontal:5}}>{item.heart}</Text>
              <Image source={icons.like} resizeMode ='cover' style={{height:15,width:15}} />
            </View>
          </View>
        </View>
      </TouchableOpacity>
    ) 
      
    return (
      <View style={{flex:1}}>
        <FlatList
        data = {NewFeeds}
        renderItem = {renderItem}
        showsVerticalScrollIndicator = {false}
        />
      </View>
    )
  }
  return (
        <View style = {{flex:1,backgroundColor:COLORS.white}}>
           {/* header */}
           <View style = {{height:"18%",width:"100%",backgroundColor:COLORS.black, borderBottomLeftRadius:20,borderBottomRightRadius:20}}>
              <View style = {{flexDirection:'row',height:'70%'}}>
                <View style= {{width:'60%',height:'100%'}}>
                  <Text style ={style.header}>Feeds</Text>
                </View>
                <View style ={{height:'100%',width:'20%'}}>
                  <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => console.log("notification")} style = {{paddingLeft:SIZES.padding*2,paddingTop:SIZES.padding +10}}>
                    <Image source={icons.notification} resizeMode="contain" style={{height:37,width:37}}/>
                  </TouchableOpacity>
                </View>
                <View style ={{height:'100%',width:'20%'}}>
                  <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => console.log("notification")} style = {{paddingLeft:SIZES.body3,paddingTop:SIZES.padding +10}}>
                    <Image source={icons.profile} resizeMode="contain" style={{height:37,width:37}}/>
                  </TouchableOpacity>
                </View>
              </View>
              {/* search */}
              {renderSearchBar()}
            </View>
            <View style ={{padding:15}}></View>
            {/* New Feeds */}
            {renderNewFeeds()}
            <TouchableOpacity style ={{position:'absolute', top:590,right:20}}>
              <Image source={icons.add} resizeMode='cover'style={{height:60,width:60}} />
            </TouchableOpacity>
        </View>
    )
} 
const style = StyleSheet.create({
    container:{
        flex:1,
        backgroundColor:COLORS.white
    },
    header: {
        color:COLORS.white,
        ...FONTS.h1 ,
        fontSize:25,
        paddingLeft:SIZES.body1,
        paddingTop:SIZES.body1+15,
        fontWeight:'700',
        letterSpacing:3,
        textTransform:'uppercase'
      },
      label: {
        position:'absolute',
        backgroundColor:COLORS.white,
        borderRadius:35,
        height:60,
        top:'76%',
        left:SIZES.padding,
        right:SIZES.padding,
        shadowRadius:10,
        shadowOpacity:0.15
  
      },
})
export default Feeds;
